wiki: Contains a list of rules. Json is divided into 3 arrays: stable, beta, and deleted. Stable is a must.
wiki_stable: Contains all stable rules, all users can get these rules.

stable.wiki_rule: You can get other information through Template Wiki.

wiki_beta: Contains beta rules that are only available to users who have been added to the rules test.
wiki_deleted: Contains deleted rules, each containing only the name, path, and isFile fields for user recovery blocking.
